title: Topics in Prog. Languages & Software Engineering
description:
This module is aimed at graduate students who are doing
or intend to do advanced research in programming
languages and software engineering. It exposes students
to recent advances in topics that include, but not limited
to, software requirements modelling, design, testing,
analysis and verification, with focus on emerging
technologies from research which have found increased
industry adoption such as software model checking,
symbolic execution based testing and automated program
repair.
